SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: DISTRIBUTION OF CONTRIBUTIONS TO DESERVING CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: AT A MINIMUM, A GRANT REQUEST SHOULD INCLUDE A COPY OF THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX EXEMPT LETTER ISSUED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, IT'S PROPER NAME AND ADDRESS, A DESCRIPTION OF WHAT THE GRANT WILL BE USED FOR AND WHETHER IT IS A MATCHING GRANT, AND THE AMOUNT OF THE REQUEST.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: EXTENSION FILING DEADLINE WAS EXTENDED TO 02/15/2024 DUE TO THE STATE DECLARING A STATE OF EMERGENCY FOR HURRICANE LEE.
